de.weltraumschaf.neuron.shell
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.neuron.shell.Environment

public class Environment
extends Object

Environment for interactive shell. Holds all created nodes.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

private  NodeFactory factory
          Factory to create nodes.
private  Observer handler
          Handle events of nodes it is registered for.

          Maps nodes with their id for fast lookup by their id.
